CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: OFETs based on a benzo[2,1-b:3,4-b 0 ]dithiophene copolymer manufactured on flexible substrate exhibited high hole mobility of 0.5 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 when the source-gate voltage is increased to 60 V.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph:

1. Benzo[2,1-b:3,4-b]dithiophene
2. Copolymer
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Sure, my apologies. Here are the updated "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph:

1. Benzo[2,1-b:3,4-b]dithiophene

The entity "copolymer" is not a material name, but rather a description of the material's composition, so I have removed it from the list.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the given paragraph, presented in a Markdown table:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| Benzo[2,1-b:3,4-b]dithiophene |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: OFETs based on a benzo[2,1-b:3,4-b 0 ]dithiophene copolymer manufactured on flexible substrate exhibited high hole mobility of 0.5 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 when the source-gate voltage is increased to 60 V.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Value" entities in the given paragraph:

1. 0.5 cm^2 V^-1 s^-1 (high hole mobility)
2. 60 V (source-gate voltage)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.

Sure, here are the entities that refer to the value of a material property:

1. 0.5 cm^2 V^-1 s^-1 (high hole mobility)

The entity "60 V" refers to the source-gate voltage, but it is not a property of the material. Therefore, it is not considered a "Property Value" entity in this context.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the Markdown table with the valid entities:

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 0.5 cm^2 V^-1 s^-1 |

The entity "0.5 cm^2 V^-1 s^-1" refers to the high hole mobility of the benzo[2,1-b:3,4-b]dithiophene copolymer.
